She spotted you and walks by talking to her friends, "Ew look at that discusting fat ass. Who would want to be that fat?"

112122.title: Courtney

info.brief_description: a girl finds a spell that she uses to make herself fatter...who else will find it?
info.description:
Briana isn't your typical girl. She's not fat but not thin either .Jounior year of HS has been stressful so far and her way out of stress is her fantasy. She always wanted to be a "bigger" girl and one day while searching around Briana stumbles upon a spell that she usese to make her self fatter.

You decide how she gets bigger, who else finds out about the spell...

Rules...
Keep it straight ( no gay and lesbion)
have fun
